display_help: The Nemesis Monstrosity is capable of delivering a crushing blow from its drill arm causing High Smashing damage and Moderate Lethal damage over time. Foes that are struck will also be knocked back and disoriented for a short time. Damage: High, Moderate DoT, Recharge: Moderate
display_short_help: Melee, High DMG(Smash), Moderate DoT(Lethal), Foe Disorient, Knockback

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Smashing damage.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You hit {PlayerDest} with your {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} hits you with their {PowerName} for {Damage} points of Lethal damage over time.

messages.display_attacker_hit: You knock {PlayerDest} off their feet with your {PowerName}!
messages.display_victim_hit: {PlayerSource} knocks you off your feet with their {PowerName}!
